text: Leka (satyatiraskarula paristhiti) cala lotugala samudranloni cikatlavale untundi. Danipai oka goppa ala kram'mukoni untundi. Danipai maroka goppa ala, danipai meghalu. Cikatlu okadanipai nokati kram'mukoni untayi. Apudu evadaina tana cetini (cudalani) cacite, vadu danini cudaledu. Mariyu evanikaite allah velugunivvado, ataniki e matram velugu dorakadu
